name: Hasib Kushan
story: Faisal Gailani was born in a small village in northern Iran. He grew up with a strong sense of duty to his family and his country. His father was a retired special forces officer who instilled in him a love of long-range marksmanship. Faisal joined the Iranian military at age 16 and quickly distinguished himself as an expert marksman. He was recruited into the elite OPFOR Reconnaissance Corps shortly thereafter. Faisal takes great pride in his skills and takes his duty seriously. He hopes to prove himself on the field of battle and earn promotion to Sergeant.
